title: Upgrade Java Project
description: Upgrade Java project to latest LTS version and refactor using newer features
prompt: Using the JetBrains IDE tools, upgrade this project to use the latest Java LTS version and refactor the codebase to use newer Java features where beneficial.
example:
This will:
- Update Java version to latest LTS
- Identify refactoring opportunities
- Apply modern Java features
- Update build configuration
- Run tests to verify changes
author: GooseAI Team
